item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 13th of October, 2022
item.description: Demos: Introduction to Fantasy Premier League Independent Power Platform Connector and Create a better version of HTML Text component using PCF components in Power Apps. Project updates - Yo teams build core and Microsoft Teams Toolkit. Released 14 samples.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 11th of October, 2022
item.description: Demos - Introduction to Records Management APIs on Microsoft Graph and Build your first Command bot for Microsoft Teams with Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code. Register for Microsoft Ignite and Microsoft Teams App Camp. Enjoy latest 9 articles and 1 conversation.

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 182
item.description: Netherlands based Microsoft 365 Architect Martin Lingstuyl (I4-YOU Business Solutions) joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a discussion about business climate and connecting with remote workers in Netherlands, career progression and MVP attainment. 18 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.

Netherlands based Microsoft 365 Architect Martin Lingstuyl (I4-YOU Business Solutions) joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a discussion about business climate and connecting with remote workers in Netherlands, career progression and MVP attainment. 18 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Star rating control in Adaptive Cards
item.description: The rating control in Adaptive Cards was on a roadmap. Long time ago.
The rating control in Adaptive Cards was on a roadmap. Long time ago.
item.dc:creator: Tomasz Poszytek

item.title: How to get notifications on PnP samples shared on GitHub
item.description: How to get notifications on PnP samples shared on GitHub Power Automate can be used to get notifications for PnP samples shared on GitHub or to get reminded on any commits and pull requests in any of your favorite GitHub repos.
item.dc:creator: Albert-Jan Schot

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 6th of October, 2022
item.description: Two demos: Building a Help Desk Adaptive Card Extension for Microsoft Viva and Getting started on building SPFx solutions with reusable open-source controls. Project releases for CLI for Microsoft 365, Reusable SPFx React Controls, and Reusable SPFx React Property Controls.

Two demos: Building a Help Desk Adaptive Card Extension for Microsoft Viva and Getting started on building SPFx solutions with reusable open-source controls. Project releases for CLI for Microsoft 365, Reusable SPFx React Controls, and Reusable SPFx React Property Controls.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Series: How to build Power Apps that don't look like Power Apps - auto-height textinput - Material Design part 3
item.description: Some controls in Power Apps do not have an auto height property, which means that we can’t get the Height of a control to automagically ✨ adjust to its content.
Some controls in Power Apps do not have an auto height property, which means that we can’t get the Height of a control to automagically ✨ adjust to its content.
item.dc:creator: Luise Freese

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 4th of October, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Introduction to Privacy APIs on Microsoft Graph, Build your first Notification bot for Microsoft Teams with Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code, and Account Linking for Teams apps. Register for Microsoft Ignite and Microsoft Teams App Camp. Scan latest documents/recordings.

Three demos - Introduction to Privacy APIs on Microsoft Graph, Build your first Notification bot for Microsoft Teams with Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code, and Account Linking for Teams apps. Register for Microsoft Ignite and Microsoft Teams App Camp. Scan latest documents/recordings.

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 181
item.description: Belgium based Microsoft Senior Service Engineer Bert Jansen joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a discussion about PnP tools - .NET libraries, Modernization, Microsoft 365 Assessment and about throttling vs rate limit headers. 14 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.

Belgium based Microsoft Senior Service Engineer Bert Jansen joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a discussion about PnP tools - .NET libraries, Modernization, Microsoft 365 Assessment and about throttling vs rate limit headers. 14 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.

item.title: Build a vacation tracker app with Lists and SharePoint for Teams
item.description: When it is summer or the holidays season, we know it is vacation time.

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 29th of September, 2022
item.description: Demos: How to build a good vibes generator bot for Microsoft Teams and Building a movie voting experience as Microsoft Teams meeting app. MGT v2.6.1 released along with 6 Independent Publisher Connector, 4 script, and 1 Microsoft Teams samples.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 27th of September, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Build a productivity dashboard by using Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio, and Latest status and the next investments areas for SharePoint Framework. Registration open for Microsoft Ignite and Microsoft Teams App Camp training. Delivered 6 articles, 2 podcasts.

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.8
item.description: We’ve just published a new minor version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.
We’ve just published a new minor version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.
item.dc:creator: Martin Lingstuyl

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 180
item.description: UK-based independent consultant and Microsoft MVP - Chirag Patel (Patel Consulting) joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a discussion about technology migration strategies, work as consultant and MVP, and community involvement. 20 articles/videos/document updates by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.

UK-based independent consultant and Microsoft MVP - Chirag Patel (Patel Consulting) joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a discussion about technology migration strategies, work as consultant and MVP, and community involvement. 20 articles/videos/document updates by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 22nd of September, 2022
item.description: Demos on Building Viva Connections ACE for public holidays and Accelerate SPFx development with reusable open-source controls. Project releases for CLI for Microsoft 365 and PnP Modern Search. Announced Viva Home, the default landing location in Microsoft Teams.

Demos on Building Viva Connections ACE for public holidays and Accelerate SPFx development with reusable open-source controls. Project releases for CLI for Microsoft 365 and PnP Modern Search. Announced Viva Home, the default landing location in Microsoft Teams.

item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Power Platform Community Call – September 2022
item.description: Latest Power Platform related news, events and Community Tip. Demos - Parsing JSON in Power Apps, UX Tips & Tricks for Model-Driven Apps, and You can be an author of an Independent Publisher Connector.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 20th of September, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Introduction to SharePoint Online Admin APIs on Microsoft Graph and Getting started with Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio. Registration is now open for Microsoft Ignite – October 12-14, 2022. Delivered 4 articles and PnP Weekly this week.

item.title: How to register SPFx field customizers with the SharePoint REST API
item.description: In this article, learn how to register SPFx field customizers using SharePoint’s REST API. See how you can do this our utility web part you can use in your sites!
In this article, learn how to register SPFx field customizers using SharePoint’s REST API. See how you can do this our utility web part you can use in your sites!
item.dc:creator: Andrew Connell

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 179
item.description: Netherlands-based Global XR Technology Lead - Alexander Meijers (Avanade), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a present/future discussion about the XR/metaverse space, opportunities, and the killer app for office workers. 14 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.

Netherlands-based Global XR Technology Lead - Alexander Meijers (Avanade), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz in a present/future discussion about the XR/metaverse space, opportunities, and the killer app for office workers. 14 articles/videos by Microsoft/Community are highlighted.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: How Manage Azure SQL server Firewall using Power Platform
item.description: How to manage SQL Azure firewall from a Business Application on Power Platform Today we will make use of one premium SQL Server connector and four (04) standard connectors (SharePoint, Office 365 Outlook, Office 365 Users, Power Apps).

How to manage SQL Azure firewall from a Business Application on Power Platform Today we will make use of one premium SQL Server connector and four (04) standard connectors (SharePoint, Office 365 Outlook, Office 365 Users, Power Apps).
item.dc:creator: Duvan Baena

item.title: Microsoft Identity Platform community call – September 2022
item.description: Learn about the different types of extensions and how and when to use them in claims mapping policies or through our UX. We cover new upcoming features related to these extensions and how to simplify your integrations.

Learn about the different types of extensions and how and when to use them in claims mapping policies or through our UX. We cover new upcoming features related to these extensions and how to simplify your integrations.
item.dc:creator: Nandeesh Swami

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 15th of September, 2022
item.description: Demos: List formatting magic - neomorphic design for polished UX and Using Mockaroo Independent Publisher Connectors to automatically generate sample data. Delivered 5 Independent Publisher Connector, 2 script, and 1 Microsoft Teams samples. Check out Microsoft Teams App camp.
